**Public transport**

-   The tram stations Quai Claude Bernard ([**Line
    T1**](https://www.tcl.fr/lignes/tramway-t1)) and Centre Berthelot –
    Sciences Po ([**Line T2**](https://www.tcl.fr/lignes/tramway-t2))
    are both close to the Campus.

-   For participants coming from the train stations Lyon Part Dieu or
    Perrache, please use the Line T1.

**Bicycles**

You can use city Bicyles
([**Velo'v**](https://velov.grandlyon.com/en/mapping)); a bike station
is placed just in front of the venue before the dock.

**Walk**

The place is 17min from Place Bellecour, in the centre of Presqu'ile.
